(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN Since)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (NP
          (NP (NNP HD) (NNP Video) (NN recording) (NN technology))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (PRP$ our) (NNP Canon) (NNS cameras) (NNS -LRB-))))))))


mark(have-3, Since-1)
nsubj(have-3, we-2)
nn(technology-7, HD-4)
nn(technology-7, Video-5)
nn(technology-7, recording-6)
dobj(have-3, technology-7)
prep(technology-7, in-8)
poss(-LRB--12, our-9)
nn(-LRB--12, Canon-10)
nn(-LRB--12, cameras-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD used)
      (NP (DT a) (NNP EOS) (CD 5D))
      (PRN
        (NP
          (NP (NNP MkII)
            (CC and)
            (NNP Melvyn))
          (NP (DT a) (NNP EOD) (CD 7D)))
        (-RRB- -RRB-)))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(used-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, used-2)
det(EOS-4, a-3)
dobj(used-2, EOS-4)
num(EOS-4, 5D-5)
dep(used-2, MkII-6)
cc(MkII-6, and-7)
conj(MkII-6, Melvyn-8)
det(EOD-10, a-9)
dep(MkII-6, EOD-10)
num(EOD-10, 7D-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBG toying)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN idea))
            (PP (IN of)
              (S
                (VP (VBG going)
                  (PP (IN beyond)
                    (NP (JJ standard) (NNS photos)))
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB see)
                        (SBAR
                          (WHADVP (WRB how))
                          (S
                            (NP (PRP we))
                            (VP (MD can)
                              (VP (VB make)
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT a) (VBG blog) (NN post))
                                  (ADJP (RB even) (RBR more) (JJ droolworthy)))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(toying-3, we-1)
aux(toying-3, were-2)
root(ROOT-0, toying-3)
prep(toying-3, with-4)
det(idea-6, the-5)
pobj(with-4, idea-6)
prep(idea-6, of-7)
pcomp(of-7, going-8)
prep(going-8, beyond-9)
amod(photos-11, standard-10)
pobj(beyond-9, photos-11)
aux(see-13, to-12)
xcomp(going-8, see-13)
advmod(make-17, how-14)
nsubj(make-17, we-15)
aux(make-17, can-16)
ccomp(see-13, make-17)
det(post-20, a-18)
amod(post-20, blog-19)
dobj(make-17, post-20)
advmod(droolworthy-23, even-21)
advmod(droolworthy-23, more-22)
amod(post-20, droolworthy-23)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (RB here))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT a) (NNP HD) (NN video))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP we))
            (VP (VBD did)
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP
                  (NP (CD one))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (PRP$ our) (NN pizza) (NNS experiments))))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(video-6, So-1)
nsubj(video-6, here-2)
cop(video-6, is-3)
det(video-6, a-4)
nn(video-6, HD-5)
root(ROOT-0, video-6)
nsubj(did-8, we-7)
rcmod(video-6, did-8)
prep(did-8, on-9)
pobj(on-9, one-10)
prep(one-10, of-11)
poss(experiments-14, our-12)
nn(experiments-14, pizza-13)
pobj(of-11, experiments-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Do))
    (VP (VBD let)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP us))
          (VP (VBP know)
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP what))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP think))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(let-2, Do-1)
root(ROOT-0, let-2)
nsubj(know-4, us-3)
ccomp(let-2, know-4)
dobj(think-7, what-5)
nsubj(think-7, you-6)
ccomp(know-4, think-7)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Ah))
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (MD must)
      (VP (VB declare)
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD was)
              (VP (VBG using)
                (ADVP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN body))
                  (RB double))
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN clip)))))))))
    (. !)))


advmod(declare-4, Ah-1)
nsubj(declare-4, I-2)
aux(declare-4, must-3)
root(ROOT-0, declare-4)
mark(using-8, that-5)
nsubj(using-8, I-6)
aux(using-8, was-7)
ccomp(declare-4, using-8)
det(body-10, a-9)
npadvmod(double-11, body-10)
advmod(using-8, double-11)
prep(using-8, for-12)
det(clip-14, the-13)
pobj(for-12, clip-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNS hands) (NN you))
    (VP (VBP see)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (VP (VBP are)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NNS hands))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP Damien))))))))
    (, ,)))


det(you-3, The-1)
nn(you-3, hands-2)
nsubj(see-4, you-3)
root(ROOT-0, see-4)
cop(hands-7, are-5)
det(hands-7, the-6)
ccomp(see-4, hands-7)
prep(hands-7, of-8)
pobj(of-8, Damien-9)


(ROOT
  (NP (PRP$ our) (NNS Pizzaiolo) (. !)))


poss(Pizzaiolo-2, our-1)
root(ROOT-0, Pizzaiolo-2)
